mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_BOARD (ID, J_BNO, J_TITLE, J_COMPANY, J_ADDR1, J_ADDR2, J_CATE, J_METHOD, J_PAY, J_TERM, J_DAY, J_START, J_END, J_CONTENT, J_IMG, J_HEART) VALUES(#{id}, JOB_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{j_title}, #{j_company}, #{j_addr1}, #{j_addr2}, #{j_cate}, #{j_method}, #{j_pay}, #{j_term}, #{j_day}, #{j_start}, #{j_end}, #{j_content}, #{j_img}, #{j_heart})
mapper.select:
SELECT J_BNO, J_TITLE, J_COMPANY, J_ADDR1, J_CATE, J_METHOD, J_PAY, J_TERM, J_DAY, J_START, J_END, J_HEART, J_IMG FROM(SELECT J_BNO, J_TITLE, J_COMPANY, J_ADDR1, J_CATE, J_METHOD, J_PAY, J_TERM, J_DAY, J_START, J_END, J_HEART, J_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY J_BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM JOB_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
) JOB WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY J_BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(J_BNO) FROM JOB_BOARD WHERE 1= 1
AND J_BNO > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE JOB_BOARD SET J_HEART = J_HEART+1 WHERE J_BNO = #{j_bno}
UPDATE JOB_BOARD SET J_HEART = J_HEART-1 WHERE J_BNO = #{j_bno}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, J_BNO, J_TITLE, J_COMPANY, J_ADDR1, J_CATE, J_METHOD, J_PAY, J_TERM, J_DAY, J_START, J_END, J_HEART, J_IMG, J_DATE FROM(SELECT ID, J_BNO, J_TITLE, J_COMPANY, J_ADDR1, J_CATE, J_METHOD, J_PAY, J_TERM, J_DAY, J_START, J_END, J_HEART, J_IMG, J_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY J_BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM JOB_BOARD) JOB WHERE (RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart2} AND #{rowEnd2}) AND ID = #{id} ORDER BY J_BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(J_BNO) FROM JOB_BOARD WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID, J_BNO, H_BNO FROM(SELECT ID, J_BNO, H_BNO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY H_BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM HEART_JOB) HEART WHERE (RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart2} AND #{rowEnd2}) AND ID = #{id} ORDER BY H_BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(H_BNO) FROM HEART_JOB WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPLAINT (COM_NUM, ID, C_CONTENT, C_BNO, BOARD_TYPE) VALUES(COMPLAINT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{c_content}, #{c_bno}, #{board_type})
